sentences.en: A high ceiling creates a feeling of spaciousness.
sentences.cn: 高高的天花板会给人一种宽敞的感觉。

sentences.en: a light hanging from the ceiling
Ceiling and wall lights can operate independently.
sentences.cn: 吊灯和壁灯可单独开关。

sentences.en: Crystal chandeliers dangled from every ceiling.
sentences.cn: 每个房间的天花板上都悬有枝形水晶吊灯。

sentences.en: Festive paper decorations had been hung from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 喜庆的彩纸已经挂在天花板上。

sentences.en: It had a high ceiling, ornamented with plaster fruits and flowers.
sentences.cn: 天花板很高，上面装饰着石膏水果和花朵。

sentences.en: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 杀了猪，猪腿挂在天花板上风干。

sentences.en: Pinks and beiges were chosen to echo the colours of the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 选用了粉红色和米色，以跟从天花板的颜色。

sentences.en: Richard lit another cigarette and puffed smoke towards the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 理查德又点了一支烟，朝着天花板喷云吐雾。

sentences.en: She loved the gracefully high ceiling, with its white-painted cornice.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这里高高的天花板，它造型优美，还带有一圈漆成白色的飞檐。

sentences.en: The bullet slammed into the ceiling, spraying them with bits of plaster.
sentences.cn: 子弹砰地射进了天花板，掉落的石膏碎片落了他们一身。

sentences.en: The ceiling was grey and cracked.
sentences.cn: 天花板是灰色的，而且有裂纹。

sentences.en: The floor was level, but the ceiling sloped toward his head.
sentences.cn: 地板是平的，但天花板朝他的头这边倾斜。

sentences.en: The tented ceiling hides a maze of water pipes.
sentences.cn: 形似帐篷的天花板上隐藏着迷宫似的水管。

sentences.en: The wallpaper was peeling away close to the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 天花板附近的壁纸在剥落。

sentences.en: There was a deep crack in the ceiling above him.
sentences.cn: 在他头顶的天花板上有一道很深的裂缝。

phrases.tran_cn: 室内净高；楼底高度；上升限度
舱顶灯；吊灯；天棚灯；[气象]测云幂光
顶棚镶板；平顶镶板；舱底板格
吊车，吊顶；垂吊式天花板

trans.tran_cn: 天花板，顶棚，上限，最高飞行限度
trans.tran_en: the inner surface of the top part of a room
